name: Pastry Paradise
description:
In the mood for a delicious, delectable and TOTALLY FREE match-three puzzle?! Be a star baker and battle bad baking in Pastry Paradise!

A DELICIOUS ADVENTURE WITH EXCITING BAKE-OFFS
- Travel across delectable maps, like the Gingerbread Gardens, Wafer Woods, and Mt. Mudcake.
- Take on fun & challenging chef bake-offs to defeat your rivals.
- Battle against other players and friends in the real-time multiplayer mode.
- Choose your own path, taking on the stages you want as you chase the villains.

A RECIPE FOR VICTORY
- Play like no other puzzle game and even swap pastries diagonally for more freedom and strategy.
- Powerful boosters can make any stage a piece of cake: Freeze time, whisk the board, and more!

THERE'S ALWAYS ROOM FOR MORE
- Unique and yummy challenges like baking cakes, serving customers and more!
- Fresh daily and weekly events are always cooking up more challenges for big rewards to win.

MAKE SWEET FRIENDS
- Share a slice of happiness and send helpful gifts to friends.
- Keep up with your friends on the leaderboards.
- Unlock new maps faster with the help of a friend and keep moving along your journey.
